ComicInfo.Summary: Desperation: James and Duke have an armed standoff but get past the misunderstanding (Miles thought there might be a Martian in the house). They all travel to the next city where James needs to find insulin for Ronni. When they get there, they find the people acting irrationally, with the Sheriff trying to burn out the local grocer who is trying to keep all of the food for himself. They go to the doctor's office and find he is dead. However, Gladys, who is something of a nurse, is there and she helps James finds the insulin for Ronni. But the Sheriff and his men show up and accuse them of stealing.
